parameters.query: SELECT usuario_id, xp_total, total_xp_hoje, sequencia_atual, sequencia_recorde, meta_sequencia_codigo, proxima_meta_codigo, ultima_conversa_em, sequencia_status FROM public.usuarios_conquistas WHERE usuario_id = $1::uuid;

SELECT
  uc.id,
  date(uc.data_conversa) AS dia,
  uc.tem_reflexao,
  COALESCE(uc.total_palavras_usuario, 0) AS total_palavras_usuario,
  uc.data_conversa,
  uc.atualizado_em
FROM public.usr_chat uc
WHERE uc.usuario_id = $1::uuid
  AND uc.data_conversa >= NOW() - INTERVAL '45 days'
ORDER BY dia ASC, uc.data_conversa ASC;

WITH payload AS (
  SELECT
    $1::uuid AS usuario_id,
    $2::int AS xp_base_increment,
    $3::int AS xp_bonus_increment,
    $4::int AS xp_total_increment,
    $5::int AS sequencia_atual,
    $6::int AS sequencia_recorde,
    $7::varchar AS meta_codigo,
    $8::varchar AS proxima_codigo,
    NULLIF($9::text, '')::timestamptz AS ultima_conversa_em,
    $10::jsonb AS sequencia_status
),
atualizado AS (
  UPDATE public.usuarios_conquistas uc
  SET
    xp_total = COALESCE(uc.xp_total, 0) + payload.xp_total_increment,
    xp_base = COALESCE(uc.xp_base, 0) + payload.xp_base_increment,
    xp_bonus = COALESCE(uc.xp_bonus, 0) + payload.xp_bonus_increment,
    total_xp_hoje = COALESCE(uc.total_xp_hoje, 0) + payload.xp_total_increment,
    sequencia_atual = payload.sequencia_atual,
    sequencia_recorde = payload.sequencia_recorde,
    meta_sequencia_codigo = payload.meta_codigo,
    proxima_meta_codigo = payload.proxima_codigo,
    ultima_conversa_em = COALESCE(payload.ultima_conversa_em, uc.ultima_conversa_em),
    sequencia_status = payload.sequencia_status,
    atualizado_em = NOW()
  FROM payload
  WHERE uc.usuario_id = payload.usuario_id
  RETURNING uc.usuario_id
)
SELECT payload.usuario_id
FROM payload
LEFT JOIN atualizado ON atualizado.usuario_id = payload.usuario_id;

WITH payload AS (
  SELECT
    $1::uuid AS usuario_id,
    $2::text AS meta_codigo,
    $3::text AS meta_titulo,
    $4::int AS xp_base_increment,
    $5::jsonb AS ocorrencias,
    $6::int AS recorrencia_increment
),
atualizado AS (
  UPDATE public.conquistas_historico ch
  SET
    xp_base = COALESCE(ch.xp_base, 0) + payload.xp_base_increment,
    detalhes = jsonb_set(
      jsonb_set(
        COALESCE(ch.detalhes, '{}'::jsonb),
        '{recorrencia_total}',
        to_jsonb(COALESCE((ch.detalhes->>'recorrencia_total')::int, 0) + payload.recorrencia_increment)
      ),
      '{ocorrencias}',
      (COALESCE(ch.detalhes->'ocorrencias', '[]'::jsonb) || payload.ocorrencias)
    ),
    registrado_em = NOW()
  FROM payload
  WHERE ch.usuario_id = payload.usuario_id
    AND ch.meta_codigo = payload.meta_codigo
  RETURNING ch.id
)
INSERT INTO public.conquistas_historico (
  usuario_id,
  tipo,
  meta_codigo,
  meta_titulo,
  xp_base,
  xp_bonus,
  nivel_anterior,
  nivel_novo,
  detalhes
)
SELECT
  payload.usuario_id,
  'conversa',
  payload.meta_codigo,
  payload.meta_titulo,
  payload.xp_base_increment,
  0,
  NULL,
  NULL,
  jsonb_build_object(
    'recorrencia_total', payload.recorrencia_increment,
    'ocorrencias', payload.ocorrencias
  )
FROM payload
WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM atualizado);

INSERT INTO public.conquistas_historico (
  usuario_id,
  tipo,
  meta_codigo,
  meta_titulo,
  xp_base,
  xp_bonus,
  nivel_anterior,
  nivel_novo,
  detalhes
)
VALUES (
  $1::uuid,
  'conversa',
  $2::text,
  $3::text,
  $4::int,
  $5::int,
  NULL,
  NULL,
  COALESCE($6::jsonb, '{}'::jsonb)
);
